channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Diesel Ultrahuman Ring Is A Fashion Forward Smart Ring
item.description: The Diesel Ultrahuman Ring brings a more provocative look to the underlying smart ring tech Ultrahuman offers in its existing Ultrahuman Air Ring wear...

item.title: Beyond Streaming: AI-Powered Family Activities This Holiday
item.description: While the glow of another Netflix binge session will surely illuminate living rooms this holiday season, AI offers families the chance to create rathe...

item.title: Goldman Sachs CFO on the company’s AI reboot, talent, and growth
item.description: Goldman’s OneGS 3.0 revamp is underway.

item.title: The Rise Of The TPU: Innovating For Specialization
item.description: GPUs are versatile workhorses; TPUs are specialized ASICs, with Meta and Anthropic challenging Nvidia’s moat.

item.title: Can Anything Upset ‘Clair Obscur: Expedition 33’ For GOTY At The Game Awards?
item.description: The Game Awards are tomorrow, and everyone is wondering if anything can upset clear favorite Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 for 2025's GOTY.

item.title: America’s mobile housing affordability crisis reveals a system where income determines exposure to climate disasters
item.description: California lost 239,575 residents in 2024, the most of any state, while the housing market requires a $237,000 household income for a midtier house.

item.title: International students skipped campus this fall — and local economies lost $1 billion because of it
item.description: Hosting 21,587 fewer new international students means 7,300 fewer jobs and $500 million in lost labor income.

item.title: Small businesses report record monthly surge in price increases as inflation pressure mounts
item.description: Small businesses hit a record high for price increases in November, with 34% raising prices amid persistent inflation pressures, an NFIB survey reveal...

item.title: Political communication scholar on how Zohran Mamdani hacked ‘slacktivism’ to appear on your phone, on your street and in your mind
item.description: Campaigning increasingly occurs in what researchers call a “hybrid media” environment: in person, on the news and across multiple social media.

item.title: Exclusive: Surf, an AI platform just for crypto, raises $15 million
item.description: The startup is backed by Pantera, Coinbase and DCG

item.title: How AI Is Restoring Voices Lost To Disability
item.description: A new wave of expressive, humanlike AI is helping people who cannot speak reclaim presence, connection, and dignity in everyday life.

item.title: John Deere CFO responds to Trump’s claim on costly farm gear, says tech is key to cheaper farming
item.description: As Trump unveils a farm aid package and promises deregulation, one John Deere executive says cutting-edge technology is key to reducing farmer costs n...

item.title: AutoZone opens 53 new stores while navigating inflation and tariff cost increases
item.description: AutoZone plans an aggressive store expansion with 53 new locations opened globally in the latest quarter, bringing total to 7,710 stores as auto parts...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
